articles.title: Kim Jong Un Issues Order on Promoting Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Issues Order on Promoting Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers
						
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un on July 17 issued an order on promoting the military ranks of commanding officers of the KPA on the occasion of the war victory day.
					 According to the order, O Kum Chol was promoted to General of the Air Force, Choe Kwi Hon Colonel General of the Ground Force and Jang Chol Guk, Yon Song Guk, Kim Thae Chol, Pak Kwang Bin and Han Kwang Ho Rear Admiral.
					
					 They performed distinguished feats in rounding off the combat preparedness for national reunification by fully displaying matchless devotion and popular heroism true to the Workers' Party of Korea's idea and intention on putting spurs to bolstering up the military capability.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Wonsan Shoe Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Wonsan Shoe Factory
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Wonsan Shoe Factory.
					 He said that leader Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to this factory in February, 2009 to learn in detail about shapes, fashions and weight of the shoes produced by the factory and set forth a task to decisively improve the quality of the products, adding that he came to it to learn how it was being implemented.
					
					 He looked round the room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 He noted that the factory alone, which was honored with the field guidance given by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, clearly showed how devotedly they worked for the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 Underlining the need to arrange better the room dedicated to the history of the factory to help its employees deeply grasp the undying feats the President and Kim Jong Il performed for the factory, he stressed that it was necessary to direct primary efforts to the ideological education for giving full play to the mental power of the producers in order to keep production going at a high rate and improve the quality of the products.
					
					 Going round various places such as a workteam for injection-molded shoes production, instep strap shop and shoemaking shop, he learned in detail about the production at the factory and the quality of products.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il put main emphasis on using locally available raw and other materials for the production of shoes, making them light and modernizing equipment, he called on the officials and employees of the factory to exert greater efforts to carry through the on-spot-instructions given by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Saying that the factory has still a lot of work to do, he gave it instructions to do so.
					
					 "To rapidly develop the light industry including the shoe industry is the important work for improving the people's material and cultural living standards and demonstrating the advantages and vitality of the socialist system of the country," he said.
					
					 He underlined the need for the factory to wage a dynamic drive to keep its production going at a high rate and boost the production of comfortable, attractive, light and quality shoes fit for various seasons and uses. 
					
					 He gave the factory an instruction to raise a strong wind for improving the quality of shoes to be favored by people, to be symbolic of it and to be impeccable on foreign markets.
					
					 He said: "To do so, it is necessary to put the production processes on a more modern, scientific and IT basis, set up a strict quality control system and steadily improve the management of the factory."
					
					 Underscoring the need to design well the brand of shoes being produced by the factory, he suggested naming them Maebongsan symbolic of the strong spirit and victory of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He instructed officials to pay deep attention to the work for arranging well the worksites of the factory in a hygienic and cultured way as required by its specific conditions and establishing cultured practice in production and life.
					
					 Calling for successfully remodeling the factory in the near future so that it may decisively increase the production of shoes and radically improve their quality and ensure the working conditions and living environment of its workers at the best level, he said that the party would settle all the problems arising in doing so.
					
					 He promised to visit the factory again and have a photo taken with its employees when the factory visited by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be remodeled as an icon meeting the requirements of the new century and to be impeccable.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il and Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark Day of War Victory
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark Day of War Victory 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Saturday to celebrate the 61st anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hyon Yong Chol and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments, heroes, war veterans, discharged service personnel, servicemen's families, persons of meritorious service and labor innovators in Pyongyang, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches corps of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 KPA General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 On July 27, Juche 42 (1953) the army and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S.-led imperialist aggressor forces and won a shining victory in the war under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, a historic event which was of weighty significance in achieving the independent development of the Korean nation and accomplishing the human cause of liberation, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 July 27 is the day of the second liberation of the Korean nation and the day of the historic victory which recorded a new chapter for the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 After igniting the war of aggression against the DPRK, the U.S. imperialists mobilized huge forces, including their aggression forces, armies of their 15 satellite states, south Korean puppet army and Japanese militarists, and war hardware and applied all barbarous methods and means.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists made desperate efforts to enslave the whole Korean nation but could not bring the army and people of the DPRK to their knees.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK won the historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and honorably defended the independence and sovereignty of the country and the nation and the gains of revolution, thereby earning the fame as the heroic army and people who defeated the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history.
					
					 Kim Il Sung successfully applied the Juche-based military idea and theories and war methods founded by him during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and wrought military miracles unprecedented in history in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The world peace-loving people rendered positive support and solidarity and disinterested assistance to the Korean people in their decisive battle for defending the country and waged a dynamic anti-U.S., anti-war struggle, exposing and condemning the bestial atrocities of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK won one victory after another in the building of a thriving nation and socialism, bolstering up the defence capability of the country as firm as a rock and resolutely meeting all challenges of the enemies under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A long time has passed since the ceasefire in Korea but the situation is getting tenser due to the vicious moves of the enemies for aggression.
					
					 With neither military threat nor war moves can the enemies block the DPRK advancing full of conviction of certain victory, loudly singing the song "July 27 March", rallied close around the great Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 The reporter called for fully displaying the same indomitable spirit and mettle as done by the victors in the great years who marched past the square in fine array, marking the victory in the war, after forcing the enemies to sign the surrender document in the present-day drive for defending the country and building an economic power.

articles.title: WPK Congratulates 3rd Congress of United Socialist Party of Venezuela
articles.content:
WPK Congratulates 3rd Congress of United Socialist Party of Venezuela
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Saturday sent a message of greeting to the 3rd Congress of the United Socialist Party of Venezuela.
					 The message expressed the belief that the congress would serve as an important occasion in the struggle of the party to strengthen it organizationally and ideologically and advance the Bolivarian socialist revolution triumphantly. 
					
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the common struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism, wishing the congress great success in its work.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Sends Congratulations to President-Elect of European Commission
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Sends Congratulations to President-Elect of European Commission
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on July 24 sent congratulations to Jean Claude Junker upon his election as president of the European Commission in the recent election held in the European Parliament.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the DPRK and the European Union would grow stronger in various fields, wishing the president-elect and the European Commission success in their work for building strong Europe.

articles.title: Justice Is Inviolable: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Justice Is Inviolable: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has made every possible effort to distort the truth about the Korean war over the past more than six decades. The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are now going so foolish as to paint the day of their defeat as "day of victory in the war," a political chicanery.
					 The Fatherland Liberation War fought by the Korean people was the war of justice to protect the sovereignty of the nation and its territorial integrity from the aggressors' gangster-like invasion to dominate the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK was just two years old but the heroic Korean people strikingly demonstrated their indomitable spirit and strong will and won a brilliant victory in the fierce war against the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 In the Korean war the U.S. sustained the heaviest military and political setback in its 100 odd year-long history of wars of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. News and World Report said that the losses the U.S. forces suffered were more than two times those Americans sustained in five big wars, i.e. independence war, 1812 war, Mexico war, U.S.-Spain war and Philippine war.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces had not mentioned the Korean war, calling it a "forgotten war", as they sustained a heavy defeat in the war. It is a strange farce that they began trumpeting about "victory" in the Korean war all of a sudden.
					
					 How will the U.S. explain the surrender document signed by Clark, the then commander of the "UN forces" on display in the hall in Panmunjom where the armistice agreement was signed?
					
					 Afterwards, Clark deplored that what he earned while executing the orders of his government was an unworthy fame as the first commander of the U.S. forces who signed the armistice agreement without any victory.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are talking about "day of victory in the war" in disregard of the historical facts, a poor political cartoon.
					
					 Entering the 21st century, the U.S., oblivious of the lesson taught by its defeat in the Korean war, is persisting in its moves for a war of aggression to dominate the world.
					
					 The U.S. is staging ceaseless war maneuvers on the Korean peninsula. Shortly ago, it decided to spend 5.8 billion U.S. dollars in five years to come for coping with the non-existent long-range missile attack of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. moves for war of aggression against sovereign states advancing along the road of independence are bound to go bankrupt for their injustice.
					
					 History clearly proves that only justice will bring a final victory.

articles.title: U.S. Should Not Forget Disgraceful Defeat in War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Should Not Forget Disgraceful Defeat in War: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article warns that the U.S. should not forget the history of its ignominious defeat in the Korean war.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is staging a foolish burlesque in a bid to paint the defeat it sustained in the war as "victory". 
					
					 The Korean war is often called a "forgotten war" in the U.S. This is the last resort for the warmongers who think it is better for them to forget the shameful and nightmare-like war.
					
					 This shows that the U.S. seeks to retrieve its ignominious defeat and attain its ambition for aggression at any cost, far from drawing a lesson from its bitter defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind the lamentable confessions by generals of the U.S. imperialist forces that the U.S. fought a wrong war with a wrong rival in the wrong place and at a wrong time.
					
					 If the U.S. ignites a war of aggression on this land again, it will not just end with cries of distress by the murderous generals.
					
					 All wars ignited by the U.S. imperialists were fought in lands far away from its mainland. Therefore, not a single bomb was dropped on the U.S. land.
					
					 The same was the case with the Korean war. Korea turned into the sea of flames and ashes owing to the U.S. imperialists, but neither single bomb nor shell were dropped on the land of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. should know that the situation today is different from what it was.
					
					 If the U.S. dare ignites the second Korean war, the DPRK will strike every place where the aggressors can set their foot on and blow up the strongholds for aggression.

articles.title: War Provokers Are Doomed to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
War Provokers Are Doomed to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. should bear in mind that the war provokers are doomed to a miserable ruin and the defenders of justice deserve a great victory.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 July 27, 1953 was the day when the U.S. which claimed not losing even a single war in more than 110 wars since its foundation suffered a bitter and disgraceful defeat in the Korean War ignited by itself, and signed the surrender document before the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' defeat in the Korean War was not just defeat sustained by a loser in the war but it served as a critical occasion that humbled the arrogance of the U.S. imperialists and heralded their tragic fate.
					
					 Sixty one years have passed since the war, but the U.S. and its allies are still trying to keep the truth about the provocation of the war shrouded in the mists and stifle the DPRK while branding it as the provoker just like a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 It is the U.S. intention to swallow the whole Korean peninsula by igniting a war at any cost after branding the DPRK as the provoker. It is the extension of the U.S. imperialists' vicious hostile policy towards the latter and its direct outcome.
					
					 The U.S. is miscalculated, however.
					
					 Only merciless punishment awaits the war provokers. History of the DPRK-U.S. confrontation proves this.
					
					 The DPRK has already declared that if the U.S. imperialists get oblivious of the historical lesson and ignite a war of aggression, they will spend the hardest time with their fate at stake.
					
					 This is not an empty talk.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The family laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: History: U.S. Suffers Shameful Defeat in Korean War
articles.content:
History: U.S. Suffers Shameful Defeat in Korean War
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- On June 25, 1950, the U.S. imperialists ignited a war against the young Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The U.S. hurled to the war at least two million troops, including one third of its ground force, one fifth of the air force and most of the Pacific fleet and troops of its fifteen allies as well as south Korea and Japan, along with huge latest weaponry. And taking part in it were such notorious brass hats as MacArthur and Clark.
					
					 In the war, the U.S. aggression forces indiscriminately destroyed everything and committed barbarous atrocities, even using germ and chemical weapons.
					
					 Massively reinforcing their troops, the U.S. imperialists had attempted to swallow up the whole Korea by launching "General Christmas Offensive" and "summer and autumn offensives" and so forth during the war.
					
					 However, the heroic Korean People's Army of the DPRK dealt a telling blow at the aggressors. During the war it killed or captured more than 1 567 000 enemy troops including 405 000 U.S. troops and destroyed or captured at least 12 200 planes, 560 warships and other vessels, 3 200 tanks and armored cars, 13 300 vehicles and 7 690 artillery pieces.
					
					 After all, the U.S. imperialist aggressors suffered a shameful defeat in the war and could not but keel down on their knees to the army and people of the DPRK on July 27, 1953.
					
					 The DPRK's victory in the war was entirely thanks to President Kim Il Sung's Juche-based military idea and war tactics, rare wisdom and commanding art.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Overpowers U.S. Forces with Superb Stratagem
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Overpowers U.S. Forces with Superb Stratagem
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Korean people's victory in the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War was entirely attributable to President Kim Il Sung's Juche-based military idea, superb stratagem and distinguished commanding art.
					 Clark, the then commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East and commander of the "UN Forces", wrote that the successes achieved by the Korean People's Army in the last Korean War were ascribable to the experienced command of General Kim Il Sung.
					
					 During the war, Kim Il Sung brought to naught all of operational plans worked out by noted U.S. brasshats.
					
					 The defeat in the war was the first for the U.S. boasting of its 100-year-long war history. When the U.S. was driven to the corner in the war, it sought to use even A-bombs, but such scheme went in vain.
					
					 The war rocked the U.S. supremacy over the world at its bottom and heavily struck the imperialists' colonial system.
					
					 The Korean War eloquently showed that any small country can win over any formidable forces, once it is guided by an illustrious leader.

articles.title: Korean People's Tradition of Winning Victory in War Will Last Forever
articles.content:
Korean People's Tradition of Winning Victory in War Will Last Forever 
						
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- 61 years have passed since the DPRK won the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 This tradition has been successfully carried forward thanks to the undying feats performed by the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK won a historic victory in the war against the armed invasion by the U.S. imperialists. They also won one victory after another in the ceaseless stand-off with the imperialist allied forces. This was ascribable to the outstanding leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Il Sung defeated two formidable imperialist forces and exalted the dignity and honor of the country and the people with his Juche-oriented military idea and distinguished stratagem.
					
					 The U.S. mobilized more than two million forces in the Korean war and applied the most barbarous war methods and means to nip the DPRK in the bud.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK led by the President always took initiative in the whole course of the war, inflicting an ignominious defeat on the U.S. imperialists and demonstrating the stamina of heroic Korea before the whole world.
					
					 The President advanced unique strategies and tactics and war methods unprecedented in the world history of wars in each period and at each stage of the war, thus making sure that the numerical and technical superiorities of the enemies were defeated by means of political, ideological, strategic and tactical ones.
					
					 By leading the war to victory, the President brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for the U.S. imperialist aggressors and made an immortal contribution to accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The history of Kim Jong Il's outstanding and tested Songun leadership occupies brilliant pages in the DPRK's history of victory in the war.
					
					 Kim Jong Il achieved a victory in the fierce confrontation with the imperialists and the U.S. by providing his unique Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Even after the ceasefire, there continued fierce confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialists and the forces hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 Entering the new century, the U.S. imperialists have gone to extremes in their moves to wantonly violate the sovereignty of other countries and invade and seize strategic strongholds.
					
					 The U.S. plunged the world into the whirlwind of a "war on terror" with the September 11 incident as an occasion, thus cruelly dampening the human desire for peace and stretching its tentacles of aggression and interference to the DPRK.
					
					 The struggle to foil the U.S. imperialists' moves to ignite a new war on the Korean peninsula at any cost was an unprecedented war without a gun report as fierce as the last Korean war.
					
					 Kim Jong Il foiled every move of the imperialist allied forces for a war and their nuclear threat and blackmail with his Songun revolutionary leadership and won a sure victory in the struggle to defend socialism.
					
					 The DPRK's great tradition of winning a great victory in the war is given steady continuity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Downpour Hits DPRK
articles.content:
Downpour Hits DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Typhoon-10, which turned to low pressure, moving northeast through the central West Sea of Korea, brought much rainfalls to most areas of the DPRK between 18:00 Thursday and 18:00 Saturday.
					 More than 200 mm rainfalls were registered in 20 cities and counties of the country. In particular, it rained 298 mm in Kusong City, 293 mm in Anju City, 247 mm in Yomju County, 238 mm in Munchon City, 237 mm in Cholsan County, 233 mm in Nyongbyon County, 230 mm in Unjon County, 229 mm in Kaechon City and 228 mm in Tongchang County.
					
					  Downpour hit most areas of North Phyongan Province, Pyongyang City and some areas of South Phyongan, North Hwanghae, Kangwon and Jagang provinces. In three hours Yomju County witnessed rainfalls of 120 mm, Cholsan County 108 mm, Ryongchon County 105 mm, Kusong City 103 mm, Uiju County 91 mm, Tongchang County 77 mm, Sonchon County 76 mm and Changsong County 70 mm.
					
					 Storms at a speed of over 10 meters per second swept most areas in the west coast and some areas of South Hamgyong and Kangwon Provinces. Wind of 24m/s was observed in coastal area of Ryongyon County, 20m/s in Kaesong City and Kumchon County of North Hwanghae Province, 18m/s in Rinsan County of North Hwanghae Province and Onchon County, Nampho City and 15m/s in Phihyon County of North Phyongan Province and Pongchon, Yonan, and Paechon counties of South Hwanghae Province. 
					
					 In the morning of Saturday, 80 cm-high wave was seen in the sea off Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province and 49 cm-high wave in the waters off Mongumpho.

articles.title: New Kind of Udometer Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Udometer Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A new kind of udometer was recently developed by the Hydro-meteorological Engineering Institute in the DPRK.
					 With higher accuracy than the existing ones, this rain gauge is capable of measuring all rainfall indices, especially the maximum precipitation in fixed time. It helps make observation automated and set up a real-time observation system throughout the country.
					
					 The gauge will be conducive to preventing damage from flood and downpour.

articles.title: Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of Chongryon Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of Chongryon Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) headed by Ryu Jon Hyon, its department director, paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday. It arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Brazilian Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Brazilian Party Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Brazilian Communist Party headed by Raul Kroeff, member of its Central Committee, left here for home Saturday by air.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Open Rice Market Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Open Rice Market   Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, on July 23 in an editorial denounced the authorities' moves to open the rice market.
					 The editorial accused the present chief executive of declaring that she would totally open the rice market of south Korea, reneging on her commitments made during the "presidential election campaign."
					
					 Peasants staged such protests as throwing rice in front of the "government" building, ploughing paddy fields and burning the placards critical of the present regime in effigy, it said, and continued:
					
					 In an opinion poll the overwhelming majority of the pollees voiced opposition to the opening of the rice market.
					
					 The "government's" declaration of opening the rice market fully revealed the real picture of the corrupt power as it is an act of selling off the agriculture of south Korea lock, stock and barrel.
					
					 Defending the food sovereignty is not the task to be fulfilled by the peasants only, it held, calling for turning out as one in the actions against the "government".

articles.title: Halt to Conclusion of Military Agreement with Japan Demanded by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Halt to Conclusion of Military Agreement with Japan Demanded by S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on July 23 denouncing the authorities for seeking a military nexus with Japan.
					 The organization recalled that south Korea started diplomatic talks with Japan for military cooperation.
					
					 Japan recently denied the Kono statement in which the Japanese government admitted its responsibility for sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, and is making it a fait accompli to exercise the "right to collective self-defence", it said, and went on:
					
					 Japan's negation of the Kono statement means denying the sexual slavery and history of aggression.
					
					 The "right to collective self-defence" is also contrary to the UN Charter.
					
					 The south Korean authorities did not properly react to Japan's negation of the Kono statement.
					
					 They are trying to back Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defence" by concluding a military agreement in the form of MOU.
					
					 The organization demanded the authorities stop at once concluding a military agreement with Japan, which poses threat to the security of the nation and peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Accused of Denying "Government's" Blame for Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Accused of Denying "Government's" Blame for Disaster
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Council for Sewol Disaster of south Korea in a commentary on July 24 denounced the "Saenuri Party" for denying the "government's" blame for the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The commentary charged that  the chairman of the policy committee of the party that day blustered it was the basic stand that the ferry Sewol sinking was basically a traffic accident and compensation should, therefore, not exceed that paid to the victims of the Cheonan warship sinking case.
					
					 It branded this as reckless remarks once again rubbing salt in the wounds of the bereaved families of the victims struggling to seek a proper probe into the truth about the disaster.
					
					 The chairman repeated absurd assertions that probe into the truth and investigation cannot be mixed, suggesting his intention to reduce the fact-finding committee to be set up by a special law to a mere name, it noted.
					
					 Bitterly rapping the reckless remarks which fully revealed the true colors of the "Saenuri Party", the commentary demanded the chairman step down.

articles.title: DPRK Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Supported by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Britain-Korea Friendship Association and other progressive organizations of Britain released a joint statement on July 14 in support of the statement issued by the spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on July 12.
					 The joint statement termed the introduction of task force of the U.S. nuclear carrier George Washington and a group of Aegis destroyer Kidd belonging to the U.S. Third Fleet into south Korean ports a serious provocation.
					
					 This is little short of modern day "gunboat diplomacy" that earned an ill fame in the past, it said, and continued:
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand that it can never bring to its knees socialist Korea which regards independence as its life and soul and holds high the banner of the great Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 The DPRK-targeted war exercises which the U.S. is going to stage with the south Korean puppet forces with its aggression warships involved is a serious threat to peace not only on the Korean peninsula but in the rest of Asia-Pacific as they involve warships of Japan.
					
					 This clearly proves that the U.S. does not want the improvement of the inter-Korean relations as the exercises are timed to coincide with the advancement of a special proposal by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the publication of the statement by the DPRK government to improve the north-south relations and ensure peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is an enemy to the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We demand that the U.S. immediately withdraw its warships and stop the DPRK-targeted war exercises.

articles.title: President of Gambia Hopes for Peaceful Reunification of Korea
articles.content:
President of Gambia Hopes for Peaceful Reunification of Korea
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- President of Gambia Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh received DPRK Ambassador to Gambia Hong Son Phyo on July 17.
					 The president hoped that Korea would be peacefully reunified and become a strong country, underlining the need to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: British Bodies Back DPRK's Exercise of Sovereign Right
articles.content:
British Bodies Back DPRK's Exercise of Sovereign Right 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Society UK and other British progressive bodies issued a joint statement on July 19 as regards the fact that the UN Security Council followed the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, away from impartiality.
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 The UNSC has no right to pull up the DPRK over its efforts to bolster up its capability for self-defence such as the rocket firing and shelling drills with various missions, acts tantamount to the exercise of its sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK's rocket launching is a positive measure for self-defence to cope with the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime's ever-growing attempts at aggression.
					
					 The UNSC is acting as a puppet of the U.S. by interfering in the DPRK's exercise of its sovereign right in violation of the fundamental principle of the UN Charter on refraining from interfering in internal affairs of its member states.
					
					 We highly laud the DPRK for standing against the U.S. and the world imperialists and fully back it in exercising its sovereign right for self-defence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by British Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by British Bodies
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un is an invincible and iron-willed commander who is just identical to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, said British progressive organizations in a joint statement issued on July 12 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of the conferment of the title of Marshal of the DPRK on Kim Jong Un.
					 This was an expression of the Korean people's absolute support and trust in him, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Under his leadership last year the Korean people decisively frustrated the vicious moves of aggression by the U.S. and its south Korean puppet regime keen on stifling Juche-based socialism by force of arms.
					
					 He guided the service personnel and the people to the victory in the all-out showdown with the sworn enemy, the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He is further bolstering up the Juche-based capability of the DPRK for self-defence on the basis of the revolutionary Songun idea.
					
					 We are confident that the Korean people will win a final victory in the struggle for national reunification and the revolutionary cause of Songun under his outstanding Songun leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ordena otorgar titulos militares a comandantes del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ordena otorgar titulos militares a comandantes del EPC
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dio el dia 17 una orden de otorgar titulos militares a los comandantes del EPC con motivo del dia de victoria en la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 Segun la orden, el titulo de general de ejercito de las fuerzas aereas corresponde a O Kum Chol, el de coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres, a Choe Kui Hon, y el titulo de contralmirante, a Jang Chol Guk, Yon Song Guk, Kim Thae Chol, Pak Kwang Bin y Han Kwang Ho.
					
					 Ellos acumularon especiales meritos en la preparacion del combate por la reunificacion de la patria poniendo de pleno manifiesto la abnegacion y el heroismo masivo en pleno acato a la idea y la voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar acicate al fortalecimiento del poderio militar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan.
					 En febrero de 2009, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visito este lugar, ocasion en la cual hizo detallado conocimiento de la forma, belleza y peso de zapatos hechos en la fabrica y dio la tarea de mejorar notablemente la calidad de productos, recordo el Mariscal y dijo que el mismo vino alli para averiguar como marcha la ejecucion de esa tarea.
					
					 Primeramente, estuvo en la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					 Alli, senalo que la fabrica dirigida por el Presidente y el Dirigente hace conocer bien la abnegacion de ellos para la mejora de vida de la poblacion.
					
					 Al decir la necesidad de acondicionar mejor la sala para inculcar en el alma de los empleados las hazanas del Presidente y el Dirigente, enfatizo que debe prestar primordial atencion a la educacion ideologica para movilizar las fuerzas espirituales de los productores, a fin de normalizar la produccion y mejorar la calidad.
					
					 Recorriendo la brigada de inyeccion, los talleres de pala y calzados y otros puntos, conocio concretamente el estado de produccion y la calidad de productos.
					
					 El Dirigente subrayo que hay que usar las materias primas y materiales domesticos necesarios a la produccion de zapato y realizar el aligeramiento de productos y la modernizacion de los equipos, recordo el Mariscal y agrego que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica deben esforzarse mucho por materializar las instrucciones del Dirigente.
					
					 Le quedan todavia muchas cosas por hacer a esta fabrica, apunto y dio las instrucciones necesarias.
					
					 Desarrollar vertiginosamente la zapateria y otros sectores de la industria ligera es una labor importante para mejorar la vida material y cultural del pueblo y demostrar la superioridad y vitalidad del regimen socialista de nuestro pais, destaco.
					
					 Prosiguio que la fabrica debe luchar intensamente para normalizar la produccion en alto nivel y producir muchos calzados comodos, elegantes, ligeros y resistentes que convengan a las estaciones del ano y sus usos.
					
					 Instruyo que la fabrica debe mejorar la calidad de productos para que estos tengan la aceptacion popular y hacer los zapatos que la simbolicen y sean impecables hasta en el mercado internacional.
					
					 Para ese fin, debe realizar en alto nivel la modernizacion, la cientifizacion y la informatizacion de procesos productivos, establecer el correcto sistema de control de calidad y mejorar sin cesar las actividades empresariales, enseno.
					
					 Al senalar que debe disenar bien la marca, propuso como marca de zapatos de aqui la palabra "Maebongsan" que simboliza el impetu y la victoria del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					 Instruyo acondicionar en lo higienico los talleres conforme a las caracteristicas de la fabrica y prestar profunda atencion a los quehaceres para establecer la cultura de trabajo y de vida.
					
					 Enfatizo que es preciso remodelar en corto plazo esta fabrica para aumentar la cantidad de productos y mejorar su calidad y ofrecer mejores condiciones de trabajo y vida a los trabajadores y anadio que el partido resolvera todos los problemas que surjan en la reconstruccion.
					
					 Dijo que visitaria otra vez la fabrica, donde estan impregnadas las huellas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, cuando ella sea remodelada perfecta y elegantemente a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					
					 Prometio tomar foto de recuerdo con los empleados en ese dia.
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta visita Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por 61o aniversario de victoria en guerra coreana
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por 61o aniversario de victoria en guerra coreana
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 61o aniversario de la victoria en la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					 Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hyon Yong Chol y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas en esta capital, heroes, veteranos de guerra, ex militares, familiares de militares, ameritados, innovadores laborales, compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					 Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares. 
					
					 El informante recordo que el 27 de julio del 42 (1953) de la Era Juche, el ejercito y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea lograron victoria bajo la sabia orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung en la pasada guerra coreana contra las fuerzas agresoras imperialistas encabezadas por EE.UU., lo cual fue un acontecimiento historico de gran  importancia en el desarrollo independiente de la nacion coreana y en el cumplimiento de la causa de liberacion de la humanidad. 
					
					 El 27 de julio es el segundo dia de liberacion de la nacion coreana y el dia de victoria historica que escribio una nueva pagina en la causa de la independencia antiimperialista, dijo y continuo:
					
					 Al provocar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC, el imperialismo norteamericano movilizo enormes efectivos y pertrechos de guerra incluso a sus propias fuerzas armadas agresoras, los ejercitos de 15 paises satelites, el ejercito titere surcoreano y los militaristas japoneses y aplico todos los metodos y medios barbaros. 
					
					 Los invasores se desesperaron por esclavizar a la nacion coreana, pero, no pudieron doblegar al ejercito y pueblo coreanos. 
					
					 Al lograr la victoria historica en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos defendieron honrosamente la independencia y la soberania de la nacion y las conquistas de la revolucion y exaltaron a todo el mundo el poderio del heroico ejercito y pueblo que vencieron por primera vez a los yanquis. 
					
					 En esa contienda el Presidente logro milagros militares no vistos en la historia humana materializando la autoctona idea y teorias militares y metodos de combate creados en el periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa. 
					
					 Los pueblos del mundo amantes de la paz no escatimaron el apoyo, la solidaridad y la ayuda al pueblo coreano levantado en la defensa de la patria y revelaron las atrocidades barbaras de los invasores norteamericanos. 
					
					 Bajo la guia del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los militares y civiles coreanos han consolidado por todos los medios la capacidad de defensa nacional y han venido alcanzando victoria tras victoria en la lucha por la construccion de la patria prospera y el socialismo frustrando los desafios de toda indole de los enemigos. 
					
					 Ya paso mucho tiempo desde el cese de fuego, pero se torna mas tensa la situacion debido a la brutal campana de agresion de los enemigos. 
					
					 Pero con cualesquier maniobras belicas y amenazas militares los enemigos no podran impedir el avance de la RPDC que unida monoliticamente en torno al genial comandante de Songun, marcha a pasos firmes con la firme confianza en la victoria cantando la "Marcha del 27 de Julio".
					
					 El informante exhorto a demostrar sin reservas en la defensa de la patria y en la construccion de la potencia economica el indoblegable impetu y temperamento de los triunfadores de la decada de 1950  que pasaron por la plaza de victoria pisando el acta de capitulacion de los enemigos.

articles.title: Premier coreano felicita al presidente electo de la Comision de Union Europea
articles.content:
Premier coreano felicita al presidente electo de la Comision de Union Europea
						
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, envio el dia 24 un mensaje de felicitacion a Jean Claude Junker por su eleccion como presidente de la Comision de la Union Europea (UE) en las elecciones realizadas hace poco en el Parlamento Europeo.
					 En su mensaje, el remitente expresa conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la UE se desarrollaran mas en diversas ramas y desea al destinatario y la comision de la UE exitos en sus labores para construir una Europa poderosa.
